
# Raster algebra


## Arith-methods
 Arith functions (`+`, `-`, `*`, `^`, `%%`, `%/%`, `/`

##Math-methods
 Math functions like `abs`, `sqrt`, `trunc`, `log`, `log10`, `exp`, `sin`, `round`	

## Logic-methods
 Logical functions `!`, `&`, `|`

## Summary-methods
 Summary functions `mean`, `max`, `min`, `range`, `prod`, `sum`, `any`, `all`

## Compare-methods
 Compare functions `==`, `!=`, `>`, `<`, `<=`, `>=`
